### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20772 (fuzz: bolster ExtractDestination(s) checks by mjdietzx)

If you consider this pull request important, please als

Concept ACK

Thanks for improving the fuzzing harnesses!

Adding assertions to the harnesses allow us to catch logic errors _in addition to_ the "crash conditions"/sanitizer failures we catch by simply trying to exercise as many code paths as possible (without assertions).

Catching _also_ logic bugs is obviously better, so if you have time/interest: consider checking the other harness
Similar to the other PR, no need to invoke `IsStandard` twice here.
